action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email open in the Outlook web app. The email is from isseki<isseki.ni.to@gmail.com> and is about a box size change request. The sender is requesting the recipient to ship their product in smaller boxes next time as the current box size is too big for their workers to handle. The user is hovering their mouse over the email body.
action.program_description: The user is reading an email in outlook.
